title: Language Competency Enhancement Course Using MOOC-Based Self-Regulated Learning and Social Mirroring

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Constructing VR environments to promote social interaction among learners and providing visualization tools for individual learning progress

learning_goals: Learners monitor peer progress in a VR simulation environment and apply self-regulated learning strategies at least once a week.
Learners establish a strategy revision plan incorporating peer feedback during language task performance within 8 weeks through social mirroring scaffolding.
By the end of the course, learners demonstrate social metacognitive skills acquired through collaborative processes with peers via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
